title: WebVPython WASM Runner
desc: I built a WebVPython runner using Pyodide and WebAssembly (WASM) that serves interactive Python directly in the browser. I focused on handling message communication between iframes, enabling dynamic imports of Python modules, and validating user input to create a safe and responsive environment.

title: Bluetooth Attendance Application
desc: I developed a Python tool that automatically tracks attendance by detecting students' devices via Bluetooth MAC addresses. I added an exporter that writes attendance records to CSV files and ensured the program runs smoothly with multi-threading for simultaneous detection and logging.

title: Budget Manager
desc: I created a command-line budget manager in Rust that tracks expenses and income. I implemented structured data storage, efficient parsing of user input, and reporting features to help manage personal finances via a simple terminal interface.

title: Obesity Risk Prediction
desc: I designed an obesity risk prediction pipeline by applying machine learning models—including logistic regression, decision trees, and random forests—to lifestyle and health data. I handled data preprocessing, trained and evaluated the models, and produced visualizations that communicate the performance and insights.

title: Password Manager Testing
desc: I built an automated test suite using Selenium for a collaborative password manager. I wrote end-to-end tests that simulate user actions like creating, sharing, and retrieving passwords, and integrated the suite into a continuous integration pipeline to ensure stability.

title: Spring Boot Showcase
desc: I learned Spring Boot by creating a simple REST API. I configured controllers, services, and repositories to handle CRUD operations, experimented with dependency injection, and kept the configuration minimal to understand the framework’s defaults.

title: Portfolio Website
desc: I designed and implemented this portfolio website from scratch. I focused on responsive layout, dynamic data loading from JSON files, search and filter functionality, and theme toggling between light and dark modes to provide a polished user experience.
